cluster: Use functions to model relationships between quantities.
description: Construct a function to model a linear relationship between two quantities. Determine the rate of changeÂ  and initial value of the function from a description of a relationship or from two () values, including reading these from a table or from a graph. Interpret the rate of change and initial value of a linear function in terms of the situation it models, and in terms of its graph or a table of values.
